name: Bop To The Chop
description:
Bop To The Chop

Chop the trees to the beat of the song! Had to pull an all night cause I only had time to start last night but at least I got something done!

Game Information

Bop To The Chop is a short rhythm game I made in under 24 hours for the 52nd Ludum Dare game jam. The goal of the game is to match the beat of the song with your axe hits to take down as many trees and achieve as high a score as possible.

How To Play:

To play you must ready your axe by pressing down on the SPACE key and chop down the tree by releasing the SPACE key. These actions must be timed accordingly.

The ready taking place on the beat of the stumps.

And the swipes being timed with the beat of the trees.

Thanks for playing :)
